line_2: Might harder hearts with kindness fill,

line_1: Who to the Stars in pure Good-will,
line_2: Does to his best look upward still.

line_1: His was the charity of right goodwill,
line_2: That loves, confides, believes and thinks no ill.

line_1: And drink it with a right good-will.
line_2: Still to thy health my glass I'll fill,
